[ICON_Bullet]The first [ICON_Envoy] Envoy sent to a City-State counts as 2.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]+1 [ICON_Envoy] Envoy influence points per turn.[NEWLINE][ICON_Bullet]May enter neutral City-State territory freely.
